name: places/ChIJAQB8bYf2wokRgngBo89Ln8Y
formattedAddress: 1865 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1865 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text:
If you are in need of help or support don't call them.  You will be left waiting by the phone.

I had  experiences with 5 different workers associated with this agency.  The Director #, registration  person(point of contact for appointments),  two different therapists and a NP.

The registration person has lack of follow through.  He failed to call back repeatedly regarding questions or concerns.  I had two therapists.  The first missed an appointment and did not reach out to communicate regarding missed appointments or reschedules in a timely manner.  I switched therapists feeling uncomfortable with the handling.

The 2nd therapist I never met.  I was scheduled once through registration person then found that the appointment wasn't put through correctly by agency.  Was scheduled again for different date. Waited by the phone. Had an appointment for 1pm. Therapist did a no show and didn't reach out until 7pm at night from a private  #.  He left message that he had emergency and was scheduling me for following day at 7pm.  He did not leave a call back number for me to speak to him.  The agency didn't call  regarding the appointment and the therapist who took it upon himself to  reschedule me after he missed our appointment didn't even make it to that one either.  The NP was also a no show to the appointment.

This place is disorganized and seems completely uncaring of people's time and needs.

People reach out for therapy because they are in need of support and guidance in tough situations. Therapy agencies are responsible for providing basic reliable services.  Repeatedly failing to meet a patient on their scheduled date and time along with their inability to follow up on issues is just plain unprofessional, irresponsible and uncaring.  They are servicing people who are in a vulnerable state and in need of help.

All they did for me was cause added undue stress at a time when I needed structure and support.
